(4) Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
(4) Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

name: Cinderbrew Stein

spells.description:
Equip: Occasionally share a drink with allies who assist you in combat, granting them 5,334 of their primary stat for 15 sec and absorbing 243,674 damage. You take a sip as well, granting 2,872 Strength and absorbing 1.2 million damage.

When you fall below 50% health, you take an emergency sip. This may only occur once every 1 min.

description: Watered down for consumption by lesser mortals.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,069 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 186 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,449 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.
